entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 12:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: NNE 37 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed areas. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
